Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Amo
description: Hold in thy hands the Rune of Compassion, Rune of Sacrifice, Rune of Justice and Rune of Spirituality. Speak the word of Love (Amo) and receive the Candle of Love.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Ahm
description: Bring the Unstable Time Crystal and say this word to claim a Key of Honesty. The same word is used in Hall of Virtue to get your reward.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Beh
description: Bring the Druid's Staff and say this word to claim a Key of Justice. The same word is used in Hall of Virtue to get your reward.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Cah
description: Bring the Bowl of Tears and say this word to sacrifice yourself for someone else to claim a Key of Sacrifice. The same word is used in Hall of Virtue to get your reward.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Cor
description: Hold in thy hands the Rune of Valor, Rune of Sacrifice, Rune of Honor and Rune of Spirituality. Speak the word of Courage (Cor) and receive the Bell of Courage.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Lum
description: Bring the Robe of Humility and say this word to undergo the Trial of Humility. Complete this to claim a Key of Honesty. The same word is used in Hall of Virtue to get your reward.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Mu
description: Bring the Unstable Time Crystal and say this word to claim a Key of Compassion. The same word is used in Hall of Virtue to get your reward.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Om
description: Bring the Symbol of the Avatar and say this word to claim a Key of Spirituality. The same word is used in Hall of Virtue to get your reward.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Ra
description: Bring the Ruined Sword of Valor and say this word to undergo the Trial of Valor. Defeat the waves of enemies to claim a Key of Valor. The same word is used in Hall of Virtue to get your reward.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Summ
description: Bring Gwenno's Urn and say this word to undergo the Trial of Honor. Survive for five minutes to claim a Key of Honor. The same word is used in Hall of Virtue to get your reward.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Ver
description: Hold in thy hands the Rune of Honesty, Rune of Justice, Rune of Honor and Rune of Spirituality. Speak the Word of Truth (Ver) and receive the Book of Truth.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Vas Rel Por
description: Stand on the tile or rune and speak 'Vas Rel Por' and teleport the other end. Sometimes you can see the other stone and sometimes it's much farther away. Must have the required time gem.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Garoo Garoo
description: Say the phrase a few times to trigger the portal. This will take you the portal crossroads on Level 3.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Chronos
description: Say the phrase a few times to trigger the portal. This will take you the Damsel's Lair.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Kropf!
description: Say the phrase to summon Kropf!. He will trade you a quest item for a Bloom rune.

Words of Power & Key Phrases.name: Fate and fortune, fire and tide, reveal the gift that you now hide
description: The Ancient Coin bosses drop quest items to make the broken waystar. To summon the bosses you must have an Ancient Coin and type 'Fate and fortune, fire and tide, reveal the gift that you now hide'.
